verses.verse: By the rivers <WH5104> of Babylon <WH894>, there we sat down <WH3427> <WH8804>, yea, we wept <WH1058> <WH8804>, when we remembered <WH2142> <WH8800> TZiyon <WH6726>.
We hanged <WH8518> <WH8804> our harps <WH3658> upon the willows <WH6155> in the midst <WH8432> thereof.

For there they that carried us away captive <WH7617> <WH8802> required <WH7592> <WH8804> of us a song <WH1697> <WH7892>; and they that wasted <WH8437> us required of us mirth <WH8057>, saying, Sing <WH7891> <WH8798> us one of the songs <WH7892> of TZiyon <WH6726>.
How shall we sing <WH7891> <WH8799> the YY'S <WH3068> song <WH7892> in a strange <WH5236> land <WH127> ?
If I forget <WH7911> <WH8799> thee, O Yerushalayim <WH3389>, let my right hand <WH3225> forget <WH7911> <WH8799> her cunning.

If I do not remember <WH2142> <WH8799> thee, let my tongue <WH3956> cleave <WH1692> <WH8799> to the roof of my mouth <WH2441>; if I prefer <WH5927> <WH8686> not Yerushalayim <WH3389> above my chief <WH7218> joy <WH8057>.

Remember <WH2142> <WH8798>, O YY <WH3068>, the children <WH1121> of Edom <WH123> in the day <WH3117> of Yerushalayim <WH3389>; who said <WH559> <WH8802>, Rase <WH6168> <WH8761> it, rase <WH6168> <WH8761> it, even to the foundation <WH3247> thereof.
O daughter <WH1323> of Babylon <WH894>, who art to be destroyed <WH7703> <WH8803>; happy <WH835> shall he be, that rewardeth <WH7999> <WH8762> thee as thou hast served <WH1580> <WH8804> <WH1576> us.
Happy <WH835> shall he be, that taketh <WH270> <WH8799> and dasheth <WH5310> <WH8765> thy little ones <WH5768> against the stones <WH5553>.
